subject: Sporting Goods
Baseball
Interscholastic Athletics
Children and Childhood
lead_paragraph: In 2007, safety concerns prompted the New York City Council to require public high school teams to return to wood bats, overriding the veto of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg.
snippet: In 2007, safety concerns prompted the New York City Council to require public high school teams to return to wood bats, overriding the veto of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg.
